section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Public assistance" means any assistance described in § 8-503 of the Criminal Law Article.
"Fraud" has the meaning stated in § 8-501 of the Criminal Law Article.

text.section:
Each applicant for or recipient of public assistance shall:
read or have read to the individual a statement of the conduct that constitutes fraud; and
sign the statement to acknowledge that the individual understands that the penalties for fraud under § 8-503 of the Criminal Law Article are:
imprisonment not exceeding 3 years or a fine not exceeding $1,000 or both; and
restitution.
